As ICICI Bank UK PLC has no Dormant accounts that have a vintage of 15 years, all Dormant / inactive accounts as per the banks internal policy would also be considered as active for SCV reporting purposes and will be reported as NSTP under status code AD

ExceptionRptExcludeStsCodes.ReportName: Generic Content in customer name or address lines or account title Field
Similar Sounding Names In Customer Name Field

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: NonUK country - No Postcode format - Contains Non Numerical data
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
This report returns the non-uk customer details where there is no standard postcode format available for the customer country and also the postcode contains any non-numeric data.

Postcode format is taken from the third party database given in the below website
http://www.geopostcodes.com/resources#countries

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Invalid Duplicate Customer Mapping In GFPF

ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the UK resident non-individual customer details whose company registration number is not exist/matched with the "UK companies house registry".

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Field Length Validation Error: FSCS Defined Field Data length has been exceeded.
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the invalid entries of the SCV/Exclusion output files where the FSCS defined data length for each field is exceeded in the SCV/Exclusion output files. Every field data should be within the FSCS defined data length given in the FSCS guideline document.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Transferable Eligible Deposit exceeded the Compansatable Balance
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the sum of Transferable eligible deposit of all accounts of a customer in Account details (C) Output file must not exceed the compensatable balance of that in Compensation details (D) Output file

This report returns the customer account details if the sum of the "Transferable Eligible Deposit" amount of a customer accounts is exceeded the compensatable balance of that customer.
As per FSCS guideline, NI Number should be unique among customers. This report returns the individual customer details if there is any duplicate NI Number exists.
As per FSCS guideline, Passport Number should be unique among customers. This report returns the individual customer details if there is any duplicate Passport number exists.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Blank Space only Exist or Leading/Trailing Space Exist
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, if there is no data for any field of the SCV/Exclusion record then the field must be blank (no blank space is allowable).

This report returns the invalid records where any of the field data is having a blank space or leading/trailing space.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Country Name Found In Address Lines
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer details If any of the customer addresses line fields contains the country name.

As per FSCS guideline, "Company Registration Number" should be unique among customers. This report returns the non-individual customer details if there is any duplicate "Company Registration Number" exists.

As per FSCS guideline, "Other National Identity Number" should be unique among customers. This report returns the individual customer details if there is any duplicate "Other National Identity Number" exists.
Returns customers whose Product Name contains unusual characters.
This report returns the non-individual customer details if the company registration number is blank.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Account Detail Exist But Customer Detail Missing
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the account details where the customer detail is missing in the "Customer Details" SCV/Exclusion file.
This report returns the customer details if the postcode data is populated in any of the address line fields.

As per FSCS guideline, customer title is mandatory for an individual customer. Identifying an individual is based on the value in first forename and date of birth field. If both fields are having value then that customer will be considered as an individual customer and title field will be validated.

This report returns the customer details where there is no customer title exist.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Product Type does not exist in "Part 8.2 Product Type" list in Effectiveness Report
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer accounts where the product type of the account not exist in the SCV Effectiveness Report.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Incorrect Account Hold Indicator for POA Accounts
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS the Account Hold Indicator for POA account must be "000".

This report returns POA account details where the account's having invalid account hold indicator

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Exclusion Status Code Exist in SCV File
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the Exclusion status code provided in the SCV effectiveness report should not exist in the account status code field in SCV file.

This report returns the customer account details if any of the customer account(s) are having Exclusion status code in the account status code field in the SCV file.
This report returns the customer address details where the address line-1 data is not numeric and alphabet and then the data length is less than or equal to 4 characters.

As per FSCS specification, The file footer must appear at the end of the complete file containing the SCV or Exclusions View file for all depositors after the last record. The file footer must contain the figure "9" repeated 20 times and it must appear at the end of the file.
 
This report returns the file details where the footer is not populated as per the FSCS specification.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Companies with entries in FCA register
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
This report returns the non-individual customer (company) details who are listed in "FCA Register" database. 

Company number or company name have been checked against the "FCA Register" database and if there is any match found then the additional details are taken from "FCA Register".

Based on the Company Authorisation Status, Authority to hold client money, Firm type, Firm Legal Status or Firm Permission Status, Bank has to analyse the company details and move that to an ineligible pot.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: GBP Balance Not apportioned properly to Joint Account Holders
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: As per FSCS specification the account balance between joint account holders should be apportioned almost equally.    This report returns the account details were the account balance is not properly apportioned to the joint account holders except 0.01 difference.
Returns customers whose Account Title contains unusual characters.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Country Name Not Matched with ISO Standard Country Name
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer details if the country name is not matched with the ISO standard country name. FSCS requires country name only and no special requirement but external auditors expect ISO country name to be matched.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: IBAN Incorrect Consolidation For UK Customers
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer details whose IBAN data is exist and it is not matched with the sort code and basic bank account number populated for that account.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Invalid BRRD Flag for Company Accounts
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS rule, The Coporate Account's BRRD flag must be flagged as "No" and SME Account's must be flagged as "Yes" in SCV/Exclusion File.

This report returns company accounts where the BRRD flag not set as like above FSCS rule in SCV/Exclusion File.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Invalid UK Company Registration Number But Possible Match Found in Companies House Registry
BIC Not Exist in BIC list provided in "SCV Questionnaire for bank" Document
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer account details where the account's BIC Code is not exist in the SCV Questioner document given by the Firm

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Duplicate Customer exist in Customer information output file
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, SCVRN should be unique in the Customer Information Output file(s). 

This report returns the customer details if the SCVRN is duplicated in the Customer Information Output file(s).

As per FSCS guideline, the account in the Account Details (C) file should be unique for a customer.

This report returns the account details if the account number with SCVRN is duplicated in the Account Details (C) Output file.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: NFFSTP And FFSTP Status Codes exist for same customer
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, a customer should not have both FFSTP and NFFSTP status codes in the Account Details (C) Output file. 

This report returns the customer details where the customer accounts are having different status code (i.e. FFSTP and NFFSTP status code). Status code should be reported at customer level.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: GBP Balance Difference between the "Account Balance in Sterling" and "Calculated GBP Balance by the tool"
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
This report returns the customer account details where the Calculated GBP balance is mismatched with the original GBP balance received.
Note:-
          There will be 0.01 account balance difference reported for joint accounts. This may be due to the balance apportionment between primary and joint accounts. Bank has to convey this to FSCS if they enquire about the 0.01 account balance difference.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Different account balance captured between Aggregate Balance and Accounts Balance
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the aggregate balance for a customer in Compensation Details (D) Output file should match with the total account balance of the same customer in the Account Details (C) Output file. 

This report returns the customer details if any balance mismatch between Aggregate Balance and Accounts Balance found for a customer.

As per FSCS guideline, non-individual customers forenames and date of birth must be blank. 

This report returns the non-individual customer details If they are having any data in forenames or date of birth fields.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Missing Murex and Equation mapping details in Murex Excel
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: Returns Murex Account Details where the Murex and Equation mapping data is missing in source document

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Murex and Equation mapping exist But missing in SCV Raw data
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: Returns Customer details where the customer details is missing in Raw Data for the reported murex account(s)

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Original Balance Before Interest Implies a Very High Interest Rate
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: Reports accounts where the implied interest rate is more than 10%.
Returns customers whose Address Line 1 contains unusual characters.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Bank Name Found in Customer Details

ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
This report returns the customer details who are all having an invalid "National Insurance Number". 

This invalid "National Insurance Number" is matched based on the "National insurance number" format specification. The format of the NI number is two prefix letters, six digits, and one suffix letter. Example: QQ123456C.

As per FSCS guideline, the BRRD field must be the value as Yes or No. 

This report returns the customer account details whose BRRD field is blank or it has an invalid data.

As per FSCS rule, the customer address lines in SCV file should be written in consecutive address line fields.

This report returns the customer details where the customer address is not written in the consecutive address line fields in SCV/Exclusion file.
This report returns the customer details if any customer Main phone number is duplicated with different customer.
This report returns the customer details if any customer Evening phone number is duplicated with different customer.
Returns customers whose Address Line 2 contains unusual characters.
This report returns the customer address details where the address line-2 data length is less than or equal to 4 characters.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: National Insurance Number Missing For ISA Individual Account
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer account details where the account is "ISA" account and the "National Insurance Number" data is blank.
This report returns the customer details if there is no data exist in the Main phone number, Evening phone number and Mobile phone number fields.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Original Balance Before Interest greater than Original Balance with Interest
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer account details if the account's "Original balance without interest" amount is greater then the "Original balance with interest" amount.

As per FSCS guideline, this field should have an alphabet value.

This report returns the customer details where the Customer title is having non-alphabet value.

As per FSCS guideline, 
     For Individual customer, the first forename and surname is mandatory
     For Non-Individual customer, the surname is mandatory 

This report returns the customer details where the customer name is not comply with the above FSCS rule. 

Customers will be categorised as individual/non-individual based on the value in the customer title 
field.
              If the customer title is having a value then those customers are categorised as individual and validates the customer first forename and surname.

              If the customer title is having blank () value then those customers are categorised as Non-Individual and validates the customer surname. Forename fields should be left blank.

As per FSCS guideline, the customer date of birth is mandatory for an individual customer.

This report returns the customer details where the customer's (individual customer) date of birth not exists.

Identifying the customer as an individual is based on the value in the customer title field. If there is a value in customer title then those customers are considered as an individual and DOB should not be blank.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Invalid date in Customer DOB field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, Date Of Birth should exists in DDMMYYYY format.

This report returns the individual customers where the DOB is not in DDMMYYYY format.

As per FSCS guideline, Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and postcode are mandatory for UK residential address.

According to FSCS rule, the country field will be blank for UK residential address and this report returns the customer details if the postcode field is blank for UK address where the country field is blank.

As per FSCS rule, For UK residential address Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and postcode are mandatory. The customers listed below are UK resident customers with address
line-1 field value is missing in the Output file. According to FSCS rule, UK residential address record the country field must be blank. So if country is blank then those
address are treated as UK address and validates the address line-1, address line-2 and postcode accordingly.

As per FSCS rule, For UK residential address Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and postcode are mandatory. The customers listed below are UK resident customers with address
line-2 field value is missing in the Output file. According to FSCS rule, UK residential address record the country field must be blank. So if country is blank then those
address are treated as UK address and validates the address line-1, address line-2 and postcode accordingly.

As per FSCS rule, 
         For UK residential address Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and postcode are mandatory. 

        The customers listed below are UK resident customers with postcode
 field value is missing in the Output file. 

        According to FSCS rule, UK residential address record the country field must be blank. So if the country field is blank then those address 
are treated as UK address and validates the address line-1, address line-2 and postcode accordingly.

As per FSCS rule, For Non-UK residential address Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and country name are mandatory The customers listed below are Non-UK resident customers with
address line-1 field value is missing in the Output file. To identify the customer address as Non-UK residential address based on value in country field. If the country field
is having value then that customer address is considered as Non-UK residential address and validates the address line-1.

As per FSCS guideline, Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and postcode are mandatory for UK residential address.

According to FSCS rule , the country field should be blank for UK residential address and this report returns the customer details if the address line-1 field is blank for UK address where country field is blank.

As per FSCS guideline, Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and postcode are mandatory for UK residential address.

According to FSCS rule, the country field should be blank for UK residential address and this report returns the customer details if the address line-2 field is blank for UK address where the country field is blank.

As per FSCS guideline, 
      For Non-UK residential address, Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and country name are mandatory.

According to FSCS rule, country field should have a value for Non-UK residential address. And this report returns the customer details if the address line-1 is blank for Non-UK address.

As per FSCS rule, For Non-UK residential address Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and country name are mandatory. The customers listed below are Non-UK resident customers with
address line-2 field value is missing in the Output file. To identify the customer address as Non-UK residential address based on value in country field. If the country field
is having value then that customer address is considered as Non-UK residential address and validates the address line-2.

As per FSCS guideline, Address Line-1, Address Line-2 and country name are mandatory for Non-UK residential address.

According to FSCS rule, the country field should have a value for Non-UK residential address and this report returns the customer details if the address line-2 is blank for Non-UK address.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: FFSTP or NFFSTP Status Code exist in Exclusion accounts
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the FFSTP or NFFSTP status code provided in the SCV/Exclusion effectiveness report should not exist in the account status code field in exclusion file.

This report returns the customer account details if any of the customer account(s) are having FFSTP or NFFSTP status code in the account status code field in the exclusion file.

As per FSCS guideline, the postcode is mandatory for UK resident customer.

This report returns the UK customer address details whose address is not having a postcode or postcode is invalid or postcode format is incorrect.
This report returns the customer details if any customer Mobile phone number is duplicated with different customer.
This report returns the customer details If any of the customer's country field is having blank value in Raw data

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Exclusion Accounts with different Status code for same customer
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, customer accounts should not split into exclusion and SCV file except legally disputed and Child trust accounts. 

This report returns the customer account details who are having both exclusion and SCV status code in their accounts.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Invalid Postcode in Non-UK Customer address
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
This report returns the Non-UK resident customer details (customer address) who are all having an Invalid postcode. 

To identify the invalid postcode for Non-UK resident customers, the standard postcode format for each country is validated against the third party postcode format database.

The Standard postcode format for the Non-UK countries are taken from the below website http://www.geopostcodes.com/resources

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Non-Individual customer having National Insurance Number
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the national insurance number is only applicable for individual customers. If the customer is a non-individual then this field must be blank. 

This report returns the Non-individual customer details who are all having national insurance number.

As per FSCS guideline, the passport number is only applicable for Individual customer. If the customer is a non-individual then this field must be blank. 

This report provides the Non-individual customer(s) details who are all having data in the "Passport number" field.

As per FSCS guideline, currency code field is mandatory and it must be an ISO standard currency code. 

This report returns the customer account details where the data in the "Currency Code" field is blank or not matched with the ISO standard currency code list.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Invalid data format in "Exchange rate" field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the account details where the Exchange Rate field is having any non numeric data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Lookup Table AccountNO Customer ID mismatch with SCV raw data

ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: FSCS preferred DOB format is DDMMYYYY. If any of the individual customers DOB is not in DDMMYYYY format then those customer details would be populated below.

As per FSCS rule the file header data must be formed in below format.
	1. 14 blank spaces
	2. HEADER text
	3. Firm Registration number
	4. Date and time with format - yyyy-Year,MM-Month,dd-Date,hh-Hour,mm-Minute,ss-Second (YYYYMMDDHHMMSS)
	5. Total number of unique SCVID in the Output file with maximum length as 9
	6. Total number of records in the Output file with maximum length as 9
	7. Name of the file.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Joining Terms in Account Title Field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer details if any of the keyword / or & exist in the customer account title field.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Country Code Exist in Country field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the country field must be a country name for Non-UK customer address and blank for UK customer address. 

This report returns the customer address details if the ISO country code is populated in the country field instead of country name.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Generic Content in customer name or address lines or account title Field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, generic content like DORMANT, DEFAULT UPLOAD, C/O, HOLD, TRUST, DECEASED, GONE-AWAY, CORRESPONDENCE, etc... should not reflect in any of the customer name or address lines or account title.

This report returns the customer details if any of the generic content (keyword) exist in customer name or address lines or account title fields.

As per FSCS guideline, depositor details like name should not reflect in any of the customer address fields.

This report returns the customer details If any of the customer address field is having the depositor name or part (partial match) of the depositor name.
This report returns the customer details where the value in country field not matched with the ISO standard country code

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Special Character Exist in Customer Details
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS Rule, The following special characters should not present in Name or address fields of the customer.

            ! $ % * + ; < = > ? @ ^ _ | ~ 

 If any of the above special 
characters is exist in the customer name or address fields then those customer details would be listed below for make correction in CBS level.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Ineligible joint customer classification code existence for an eligible account
Special Character Exist in Customer Details
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, The following special characters should not present in Name or address fields of a customer.

            ! $ % * + ; < = > ? @ ^ _ | ~ 

This report returns the customer details if any of the above special character exists in the customer name or address fields.

As per FSCS Guideline, customer address details furnished in the address line field should be a meaningful data set. 

This report returns the customer details if any of the address line is having a single character except the address line-1. Address line-1 can have a numerical single character and not single alphabet.
This report returns the customer account details if the BIC Code is blank.
This report returns the customer account details if the IBAN is blank.
This report returns the customer account details if the Sort code is blank.
This report returns customer details where the customer's forename field data is not contiguous across first forename, second forename and third forename respectively.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Validate Special Characters In Other national identity number
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customers details whose "Other National Identifier Number" contains unusual characters.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Postcode and Country mismatched for UK, BVI, Jersey, Guernsey and Isle of Man
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer address details whose post code is not relevant to the country populated which means the Postcode for the countries UK, BVI, Jersey, Guernsey and Isle of Man should be populated to the respective country. If any of the postcode is populated to the different country within this list then those details will be reported.
This report returns the customer details if the customer name fields (Forenames, surname) is having a single character.

As per FSCS guideline, the account which is an exclusion account should be provided in the exclusion file if it is a genuine exclusion account. If accounts are reported as Active but possibility of exclusion through the keyword matching will be reported here.

Keywords:
       COUNCIL, PENSION, SIPP, TRUST, FUND, SOCIETY, SOCIETIES, COLLEGE, UNIVERSITY, UNIVERSITIES, BEN, BENEFICIARY, BENEFICIARIES, CHARITY, CHARITIES, WELFARE, FOUNDATION, FOUNDATIONS, CLIENT, CLIENTS, COURT, DISP, DISPUTE, DISPUTED, FRAUD, INVESTMENT, INVESTMENTS, INVEST, INVESTOR, INVESTORS, GROUP, SCHEME, RETIREMENT, RETIREMENTS, INSTITUTE, INSTITUTION, INSTITUTIONS.

As per FSCS rule, the customer title is mandatory for individual customers. Hence if any of the individual customers have not customer title then those customer details
would be populated below. To identify the customer is individual based on value in first forename and data of birth field. If both fields having then that customer will
consider as individual customer and validate the title field.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Eligible accounts report (Both FFSTP & NFFSTP Accounts)

ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS rule, 
           the customer date of birth is mandatory for individual customers. If any of the individual customer date of birth is missing, then those customer details are
 listed below 

To identify the customers as an individual based on the value in customer title or data of birth field. If either customer title or date of birth field is having
 value then those customers are considered as individual and perform the DOB missing validation against those customers.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Similar Sounding Names In Customer Name Field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer details if any part of the customer name is repeated within the name fields (including partial match).

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Joining Terms in Customer Name Fields
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer details if any of the customer name field having any joining terms like / or &.

As per FSCS guideline, the customer forenames should have a single word and multiple words should be split and placed in first, second and third forename field respectively  as a single word and the rest of the names should be placed in the surname field.

This report returns the customer details if any of the customer forename field is having multiple word within that field.

As per FSCS guideline, a customer should not be duplicated in the SCV/Exclusion file.

Hence the customer details are validated/matched with the possible criteria listed below to find the possible/genuine duplicate customers. 
            
            A. Customer First name with DOB
            B. DOB with Post Code
            C. Forename 1,Address line 1, Address line 2, City and Postcode
            D. Forename 1,Address line 1, Address line 2 and Postcode
            E. All parts of name with postcode
            F. Forename 1,Surname with DOB (DOB Fuzzy Logic: MMYYYY / DDYYYY)
            G. Name Alone Duplicate (All parts of name)

Using the above criteria, this report returns the possible duplicated customer details.

As per FSCS guideline, ineligible accounts should not exist in the SCV/Exclusion file. 

This report returns the account details if the customer name or address detail contains any of the below listed keywords then those accounts should be classified as possible ineligible accounts.

Keywords:
       FIN, FINANCE, FINANCIAL, INVEST, INVESTMENT, INVESTMENTS, INVESTOR, INVESTORS, INSURANCE, REINSURANCE, RETIREMENT, RETIREMENTS, FUND, PENSION, PUBLIC, CREDIT, CREDITS, BANK, ASSURANCE, SETTLEMENT, LOCAL, COUNCIL, AUTHORITY, AUTHORITIES, INSTITUTION, INSTITUTIONS, INSTITUTE, GOVERNMENT, CLOSED.
This report returns the account details where the account hold indicator value is not matched with the number of accounts in the account details SCV/Exclusion file for the specific SCV ID.
As per FSCS guideline, the main phone number field must be a numeric data.     This report returns the customer details where the main phone number contains any non-numeric data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: "GBP Account balance" is Not Matched with "Account balance in original currency" for GBP Accounts
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer account details where the account's "GBP Balance" is not match with "Account Balance in original currency" for GBP accounts

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Incorrect Exchange Rate For GBP Currency
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer account details where the exchange rate of the account not equal to 1 for the GBP currency account.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Transferable Eligible Deposit Improperly allocated to accounts
Transferable Eligible Deposit exceeded the Account Balance in Sterling
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer account details where the "transferrable eligible deposit" exceeded the "GBP account balance".

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Same customer exist in both SCV and Exclusion file
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS Rule, Same Customer's accounts should not exist in both SCV and Exclusion file.

This report returns, the customer accounts details which are exist in both SCV and Exclusion file.

Note : The following scenarios will not be reported.
1. It is possible for a depositor to have a legally disputed account on the Exclusions View file and a FFSTP account on the SCV file.
2. It is possible for a child to have a record on the SCV file, and a separate Child Trust Fund in the Exclusions View file (Using Customer DOB Child Accounts are identified).

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Exclusion Type value exist in SCV file
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the exclusion type is mandatory for exclusion file and it must be blank in SCV/Exclusion file. 

This report returns the customer account details if there is any value in the "Exclusion Type" field of the SCV/Exclusion file.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Missing or Invalid Exclusion Type in Exclusion file

ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the recent transaction field must be the value as Yes or No. 

This report returns the customer details whose "Recent Transaction" field is blank or it has an invalid data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Missing or Invalid Country code in "Account Branch Jurisdiction" field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the account branch jurisdiction field must be an ISO standard country code if the branch is outside UK. 

This report returns the customer account details whose "Account Branch Jurisdiction"  field is having an invalid country code or blank data. 

Note:- FSCS expects the country code for UK branches also. So Bank can populate GBR for UK branch accounts or it can be blank. Bank has to explain the reason to FSCS accordingly.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Missing or Invalid "Structured deposit account" flag
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the structured deposit account field must be the value as Yes or No. 

This report returns the customer account details whose "Structured Deposit Account" field data is blank or invalid.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Data Format issue - Non numeric data exist in "Account balance in sterling" field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the account details of the customer where the Account balance in sterling field is having non numeric data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Data Format issue - Non numeric data exist in "Authorised negative balance" field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the account details where the Authorised negative balance field is having any non numeric data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Data Format issue - Non numeric data exist in "Account balance in Original currency with Interest"  field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the account details where the Account balance in Original currency with Interest field is having any non numeric data.
This report returns customers whose Passport number contains unusual characters.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Non-AlphaNumeric character in Company Registration Number
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: Returns customers whose "Company Registration Number" contains unusual characters.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: SCVRN doesnt start with valid FRN number
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS rule, the SCVRN field must be the combination of PRA Firm Registration Number (FRN) followed by an unique customer number.

This report returns the customer details where the SCVRN is not prefixed with "Firm Registration Number".

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Missing or Non-Numeric data in Account Hold Indicator
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS rule, the "Account Hold Indicator" field is mandatory and data in this field must be numeric.

This report returns the customer details where the data in "account hold indicator" field is not comply with above rule.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: "GBP Account balance" is Same as "Account balance in original currency" for Non-GBP Accounts
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer account details where the account's "GBP Balance" is same as "Account Balance in original currency" for Non-GBP accounts

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Non-Individual Customer having Other National Identifier Type
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the other national identifier type is only applicable for Individual customer. If the customer is a non-individual then this field must be blank. 

This report returns the Non-individual customer(s) details who are all having a data in the "Other national identifier type" field.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: "Other National Identity Number" exist but "Other National Identifier Type" missing
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, Other national identity type field is mandatory when the other national identity number is populated. 

This report returns the customer details whose "other national identity number" field is populated and the "Other national identity type" field is blank.
This report returns the customer details whose email address is an invalid email address. The format of the email address would be validated.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Original Currency Balance Without Interest Matching with GBP Account Balance for Non GBP Accounts
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns Non GBP Account details where the Original Balance Without Interest same as GBP Account Balance of that accounts in SCV/Exclusion file.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Same Accounts With Different Status Code in SCV Output

ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: Returns Customer details where more than two customers are having an identical address information.
As per FSCS guideline, the main phone number field must be a numeric data.     This report returns the customer details where the main phone number contains any non-numeric data.
As per FSCS guideline, the evening phone number field must be a numeric data.      This report returns the customer details where the evening phone number contains any non-numeric data.
As per FSCS guideline, the mobile phone number field must be a numeric data.      This report returns the customer details where the mobile phone number contains any non-numeric data.

As per FSCS guideline, BIC field data must be in ISO9362 standard

This report returns the customer details whose BIC is not complies to the standard BIC format.
As per FSCS guideline, the evening phone number field must be a numeric data.      This report returns the customer details where the evening phone number contains any non-numeric data.
As per FSCS guideline, the mobile phone number field must be a numeric data.      This report returns the customer details where the mobile phone number contains any non-numeric data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Invalid Mobile phone number - UK customer
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the UK resident customer details whose mobile phone number is not start with 07.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Non-Individual Customer having other national identity number
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, "Other National Identifier Number" is only applicable for Individual customer. If the customer is a non-individual then this field must be blank. 

This report returns the Non-Individual customer details  who are all having data in the "Other National Identifier Number" field.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: "Other National Identifier Type" exist but "Other National Identity Number" missing
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, "Other National Identity Number" field is mandatory when the "Other National Identity Type" field having value. 

This report returns the customer details who are all having a data in "Other National Identity Type" and no data in the "Other National Identity Number" field.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Individual Customer having Company registration number
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the company registration number is only applicable for Non-Individual customer. If the customer is an individual customer then this field must be blank. 

This report returns the individual customer details who are all having a data in the "Company Registration Number" field.
This report returns the customer details whose IBAN is not complies with the IBAN check digits algorithm.
This report returns the customer details where the sort code value dose not complies with the standard sort code format.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Non-Individual Customer has DOB or Title
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, Data of birth and title field must be blank () for Non-Individual customers. Non-Individual customers are identified based on the blank value in the customer forename fields and data in surname field.

This report returns the Non-Individual customer details if the "Date Of Birth" or "Title" field is having any data.

As per FSCS guideline, the product type must be IAA / ISA / NA / FD1 / FD2 / FD4 / FP4P or Other.

This report returns the customer details whose product type is not available or not matching with the FSCS provided product types list.
This report returns the customer details whose account's product name is not exist or blank.
This report returns the customer details whose email address is an invalid email address. The format of the email address would be validated.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Missing Recent Transactions Date in Raw data

ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS guideline, the compensatable balance of the customer should be the aggregate balance of that customer's account and it should not exceed the FSCS furnished maximum compensatable balance.

This report returns the customer account details if any of the customer's compensatable balance is not comply with the above rule.

As per FSCS guideline, Account status code in Account details (C) Output file must match with the account status code list provided in the SCV/Exclusion effectiveness report. 

This report returns the customer account details if the account status code is not matched with the status codes provided in the SCV/Exclusion effectiveness report.
This report returns customer details where any of the customer's forename fields contains data, surname contains data, title blank, data of birth blank.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Invalid BRRD flag For Individual Customer
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS Rule, the BRRD flag should be "Yes" for Individual customers or SME companies. And rest of the customer account should be flagged as "No".

This report returns customer account details where the BRRD flag is set to "No" for Individual customers.
This report returns the customers details whose "Address Line 3" contains unusual characters.
This report returns the customers details whose "Address Line 4" contains unusual characters.
This report returns the customers details whose "Address Line 5" contains unusual characters.

As per FSCS rule, "Other National Identifier type" field must be any one of the following value.

 * NID  National ID
 * DL  Driving License
 * O  Other or Unknown

This report returns the customer details whose "Other National Identifier type" is not having any of the aforementioned value.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Data Format issue - Non numeric data exist in "Original Account Balance without Interest" field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the account details where the Original Account Balance without Interest field is having any non numeric data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Data Format issue - Non numeric data exist in "Transferable eligible deposit" field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the account details where the Transferable eligible deposit field is having any non numeric data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Data Format issue - Non numeric data exist in "Aggregate balance" field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the account details where the Aggregate balance field is having any non numeric data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Data Format issue - Non numeric data exist in "Compensatable amount" field
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the account details where the Compensatable amount field is having any non numeric data.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Unusual Characters in Customer First Forename
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: Returns customers whose First Name contains unusual characters.
Returns customers whose Surname starts with a recognised Title.
Returns customers where any of the Address Lines are duplicated in one of the others.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Customer Detail Exist But Account Detail Missing
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer details where the account detail is missing in the "account Details" SCV/Exclusion file.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Unusual Characters in Customer Second Forename
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: Returns customers whose Second Name contains unusual characters.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Unusual Characters in Customer Third Forename
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: Returns customers whose Third Name contains unusual characters.
Returns customers whose Surname contains unusual characters.
Returns customers whose First Name starts with a recognised Title.
This report returns the customers details whose "Address Line 6" contains unusual characters.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: UK Postcode exists in NON UK Address
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns the customer details whose country is NON-UK and the postcode field is having a valid UK postcode.
This report returns the customer account information whose "Account Number" contains unusual characters.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Product Name does not match against the Product Type in "Part 8.2 Product Type" list in the Effectiveness Report
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report cross validate the product type with product type furnished in the effectiveness report respective of product name and returns the customer details whose product type is invalid accordance with product details in effectiveness report

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Product Name does not exists in "Part 8.2 Product Type" list in Effectiveness Report
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: This report returns customer details whose product name not matched with the product name furnished in the effectiveness report.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Unusual Character in Accounts Status Code
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION: Returns customer accounts whose "account status code" contains unusual characters except "/" character.

ExceptionReports.RPTNAME: Exclusion Type does not match with status code defined in Effectiveness Report
ExceptionReports.DESCRIPTION:
As per FSCS rule, the exclusion account's must categories and reported in different exclusion type code in exclusion file based on account category as like below .

 Account Category                                               Exclusion Type Code
 -----------------------                                               ---------------------------
 dormant account                                                   LEGDOR
 Legally disputed Accounts                                    LEGDIS
 Sanctioned Accounts                                           HMTS
 Account holder not immediately identifiable          BEN
 
This report returns the customer accounts where the account not categories properly in exclusion type based on FSCS rule.
This report returns the customer details if any customer email address is duplicated with different customer.
